titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MENTAL HEALTH ACT LEGAL STATUS CLASSIFICATION CODE (AT CENSUS DATE) - Description

div.p: MENTAL HEALTH ACT LEGAL STATUS CLASSIFICATION CODE (AT CENSUS DATE) is the same as attribute MENTAL HEALTH ACT LEGAL STATUS CLASSIFICATION CODE at the census date.
MENTAL HEALTH ACT LEGAL STATUS CLASSIFICATION CODE (AT CENSUS DATE) is only required for the Admitted Patient Care CDS - Detained and/or Long Term Psychiatric Census.
